spec.description: Root cause investigation with error source breakdown and cascade chains

spec.expr: (level:ERROR OR level:WARN) environment:$environment stack:in($stack) service:in($service) | stats count() as total
(level:ERROR OR level:WARN) environment:$environment stack:in($stack) service:in($service) | stats by(_time:5m, error_code) count() as errors
(level:ERROR OR level:WARN) environment:$environment stack:in($stack) service:in($service) | stats by(service) count() | stats count() as total
(level:ERROR OR level:WARN) environment:$environment stack:in($stack) service:in($service) | stats by(error_code) count() as errors | sort by(errors) desc
(level:ERROR OR level:WARN) environment:$environment stack:in($stack) service:in($service) | stats by(error_type) count() as errors | sort by(errors) desc
(level:ERROR OR level:WARN) environment:$environment stack:in($stack) service:in($service) | stats by(error_message) count() as count | sort by(count) desc | limit 20
level:ERROR error_source:* environment:$environment stack:in($stack) service:in($service) | stats count() as total

topk(20, sum by (service, stack) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack", service=~"$service", success="false"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (service, stack) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100)
topk(20, sum by (service, stack) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack", service=~"$service", success="false"}[$__rate_interval])))

topk(20, sum by (action, service, stack) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack", service=~"$service", success="false"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (action, service, stack) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100)

topk(20, sum by (action, service, stack) (count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack", service=~"$service", success="false"}[$__rate_interval])))
level:ERROR NOT error_source:* environment:$environment stack:in($stack) service:in($service) | stats count() as total
level:ERROR error_source:* environment:$environment stack:in($stack) service:in($service) | stats by(error_source, service, stack) count() as errors | sort by(errors) desc | limit 50
level:WARN environment:$environment stack:in($stack) service:in($service) | stats count() as total
level:ERROR environment:$environment stack:in($stack) service:in($service) | sort by (_time desc) | limit 200

sum(count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack", service=~"$service", success="false"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(count_over_time(request_duration_ms{environment="$environment", region=~"$region", stack=~"$stack", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100

spec.title: Error Analysis
